[i]Love the Prophet, because he loves the sinner. Love the sinner, because he is you. Without the sinner, what need is there for a redeemer? Without sin, what grace has forgiveness?[/i]

For a first-person shooter, BioShock Infinite is a surprisingly deep game. The passage above is only the first audio diary that you get to pick up maybe 10 minutes into the story; I mean, if you're a pholosophy major and it looks like childish scribbles for you, then go read your "Critique of Pure Reason" or whatever, but I'm genuinely impressed with the caliber of moral and social issues raised in this game's narrative. You get to ponder on racism, tyranny, religious bigotry, relationships within family, amongst other trivial things like quantum physics and intertwined realities – and it doesn't feel old or tired [i]at all[/i].

Now, other people have already told you how gorgeous this game is, and how great of a job everyone did at voice acting, and everything about the gripping story with its [i]shocking[/i] end – but have you heard of Elizabeth? She will keep you company almost from start to finish, and she is the best follower imaginable – just look at all the things she can do:

❤ When a Motorised Patriot barrages you with suppressing fire from his heavy machine gun and spouts some religious rubbish in the process – [i]"My aim is true, as my eye is the Prophet's!"[/i] – you take [b]a lot[/b] of damage. Oh boy, the screen goes a bit dimmer and you hear your own heartbeat slowing down – who shall come to your rescue? "Patch yourself up!", she says, and throws you a health kit. Wait, where is the key to your heart? Has it just been stolen?

❤ When a soldier with an RPG is standing right in front of you, reloading, preparing to end your miserable life with a single shot, and you see "[b]out of ammo[/b]" written right there in bloody crimson – who will give you a magazine full of answers to all of your problems? "I found ammo!", she says, and you begin contemplating a marriage proposal.

❤ "Got empty pockets? Best keep on walking..." – this is how automated vending machines mock you time and time again, but everything changes as soon as Elizabeth throws you a shipload of cash she found lying around so that you can buy all of the sweets in the supermarket. Moreover, if you spend a hefty sum of money purchasing upgrades, she will immediately give you a couple hundred bucks – it's almost as if she doesn't want you to feel bad about this whole "empty pockets" thing. Hm-m, come to think of it, it's almost as if the developers [i]wanted you to like her...[/i] Strange...

On a side note, the Artwork section in this game's Community Hub is permanently disabled, since various artists all over the world have created a bunch of non-family-friendly content featuring her. I guess it's a shame that such an influential and well-written character is being reduced to a... promiscuous woman, but I get it. Not my first day on the Internet!

Anyway, Elizabeth is also quite fast (faster that you at times), which means that you won't have to stand and wait for her. Crazy, I know, but there is more – if you find a lockpick, she can open a safe, and guess what's inside? Is it Christmas or something?

In conclusion, these two reasons alone – great storytelling and Liz herself – are enough for you to buy this game and have about 30 hours of fun with the main story, or up to 60 if you want to complete 3 DLCs and earn all the achievements. One of them – Blue Ribbon Champ – is incredibly challenging and totally random, so, good luck with that.

2020.7.1
一个关于人性、政治、哲学和宗教的故事。  与其叫生化奇兵倒不如叫物理骑兵。 开头的氛围非常诡异，但是遇到伊丽莎白之后，这个游戏就不再单调，射击加魔法真的很爽。 我不知道结局是好还是坏，只是我到现在都还没有缓过气来。 这是真正的艺术品。
随着一曲玫瑰人生萦绕在伊丽莎白的耳畔，她和布克的故事也就结束了，神作，通完海葬发现这是个救赎和被救赎的故事，时间穿梭类的题材还是戳我啊

Consejo si quieres jugar este juego, tomate tu tiempo ve despacio y disfruta de la historia, no juegues directamente a este, primero pasate por los 2 primeros sacando el final bueno de cada uno
si ya lo hiciste sientate y disfruta de un juego con mecanicas divertidas, desafiante en algunos puntos pero sobre todo disfruta de su historia, tal vez para mas de uno dificil de entender, pero siempre esta la opcion de rejugarlo

This was my first "BioShock" game. I pick this up during a steam sale and thought it was a good way to kill time.

Overall I think it's a nice fps game with an interesting enough story. It is not too long, took me about 11 hours to beat on the hardest difficulty. The game's setting is very visually pleasing, it was actually the reason that I choose to play "BioShock Infinite" over the original "BioShock" the whole "city in the sky" had me interested, and did not disappoint.

Though I will say, if you are not good a remembering plot points the ending might have you questioning what happened.  I'll admit that I need to watch a 25 min. video explaining the ending before I could fully appreciate the story.

also R.I.P Elizabeth's pinky

剧情方面涉及到了时间和空间的变量，脑洞很大有些难以理解，我玩过一遍以后百度了剧情才完全懂。
战斗系统做的还是不错的，由易到难不会让人无聊或者是缺乏挑战，但同时还是可以打过去的。

Ah, what to say of Bioshock Infinite? It's just so freaking cool. The visuals are amazing, the story is so interesting, the characters are built so well. The gameplay is entertaining. It takes all the stuff the prior Bioshock games succeeded in and makes it even better.  Overall just a 10/10 for me, one of my all time favorites.

剧情很棒，虽然自己玩的时候没搞懂，里面讽刺暗喻了很多政治因素，画质感觉很好，只是女路人的脸模型重复率太高，丑到和我老滚5捏出来的一样，相比而言伊丽莎白的画风就特别偏向迪士尼风格，ai超高，还会按照需求提供弹药，金钱和治疗包，真是令人赞不绝口的副手，玩法方面射击手感极佳，异能虽然有点串戏但体验很棒，空中乘坐轨道的方式让人眼前一亮，一些追逐环节紧迫感十足，虽然有点晕，但毫不怀疑地说这是一部非常好的佳作。

I was both hyped and antsy about playing this right after the disappointment of Bioshock 2, but it more than fulfilled my expectations. I hold it in very close regard as to Bioshock 1. The world-building, plot, and characters of this game are far more interesting. I cared about most of the important characters, especially Elizabeth. Just like Bioshock 1 I listened to every Audio Diary and explored most of what I could. The world of Columbia is much more vibrant than Rapture, and I enjoyed it more. The much larger world allows you to see the dynamics of Columbia, especially it's class and racial disparity. Infinite will beat you over the head with early 1900s racial dynamics, and even show ridiculous shit like phrenology a couple times. The slums of America, especially during the turn of the 20th century are depicted as you would expect. The counter force of this is embodied in the Vox Populi, loosely based on the Red Army Faction in West Germany. Unlike Bioshock 2, this portrayal is more coherent and grounded, whether or not you decide to interpret this as criticism or both sides-ism. The parallel to the House of Romanov was among one of the most interesting events in Infinite. Any attempt to dive further into the actual plot is spoiler ridden, and in short, it is that confusing, but also interesting. My largest criticism with this game is the departure to Cover-based Shooter this game took. The addition of a recharging shield, removal of portable first aid kits and eve syringes, leads to a more derivative gameplay experience. The game feels quite smooth, but I would much prefer Bioshock 2's methods if they were polished up a bit more. The use of Vigors are the best incarnation of Plasmids by far in my view, they are simple yet elaborate. I used a much greater variety of the Vigors than Plasmids in previous games, but perhaps a lower number due to the lack of portable syringes in favor of Salt. Elizabeth giving the player Health, Salt, and Ammo is also a great addition in order to have Elizabeth not be useless or a burden. Overall, great game. In addition, Burial At Sea is one of the best DLC's I have ever played. And together this make's Bioshock Infinite not only a fitting end to Bioshock, but a worthy end.

Bioshock infinite sadece iyi bir oyun olmakla kalmiyor, bu oyun belkide gelmiş geçmiş en iyi oyunlardan biri. Eğer diğer Bioshock oyunlarını oynadıysanız ve "İlk iki oyun birbirine çok benziyor üçüncüde bayar" diyorsanız bu oyuna kesinlikle bir şans vermelisiniz. Temelde biraz aynı dursada infinitenin ydiğer oyunlardan farklı yaptığı iki tane şey var, biri oynanıştaki hızlılık diğeri de atmosfer ve bu iki fark aslında temelde aynı olan oyunu size öyle bir yansıtıyorki tamamen farklı oyunlar gibi hissettiriyor. Combattan başlarsak combattaki yeniliğin combata katılan hız olduğunu söylemiştim, combata hızı katan şey ise ulaşım aracı yerine de geçen tekerlekli eldiveniniz. Bu eldivenle artık combatta üstlerde bulunan çubuklarda kayabiliyorsunuz ve bu eldivenle kayma olayı oyunu gerçekten çok eğlenceli yapıyor. İlk kez bu oyunda eklenmese de oyundaki büyü mantığı hakkında da konuşmamız gerek. Diğer bioshock oyunlarında olduğu gibi bu oyunda da vigor isimli büyüleriniz var ve diğer oyunlardakilere göre çok daha kullanışlılar ve havalılar. Yani kısaca oyunun combatı gayet iyi, fakat combatı sevmeyen bir sürü insan olmuş o yüzden tek beklentiniz combat ise bu oyundan uzak durun çünkü dediğim gibi combat güzel değil diyen de var o yüzden sevmeme ihtimaliniz de var. Atmosfer ve müziklerden bahsedecek olursak ikisi de şahane. Oyun sizi diğer bioshockların su altında bulunan klostrofobik ve gerilimli rapture şehrinden alıp bulutlar arasındaki columbia şehrine götürüyor ve tuhaftırki bu oyun açık dünya olmamasına rağmen belkide bütün açık dünya oyunlarından çok daha canlı bir dünyası var, nasıl yapabilmişler bende anlamadım. Ve sıra geldi bu oyunu alma sebebiniz olması gerektiğini düşündüğüm hikayeye. Hikaye direkt olarak verilmiyor diye şikayet eden insanlar olmuş ama aslında hikaye size vereceğini veriyor sadece detaycı insanlar için arkasında bir lore bırakıyor. Ama merak etmeyin o loreyi araştırmasanız da ana hikaye anlaşılıyor ve bir oyunda anlatılan en kaliteli hikayelerden birini deneyimliyorsunuz. Kısaca Bioshock infinite bir başyapıt ve favori oyunlarımdan da biri

[h1][i]Антиутопия, которую построили на небесах[/i][/h1]
[i]BioShock Infinite[/i] сделана так, чтобы понравиться всем, но при этом ни на миг не опускается до уровня игр-жвачек. Любители сложных историй получат потрясающий сюжет, кажущийся вначале обманчиво простым. Поклонникам качественного боевика подарили простую систему развития и бешеную динамику. И, наконец, всех осчастливили появлением Элизабет — одного из немногих игровых персонажей, за чью жизнь действительно хочется биться до последнего патрона. Потому что она — по-настоящему живая.
	[u]Вердикт[/u]: стоит брать!
Interesting story and fun game mechanics.
A campanha desse jogo e suas DLCs são fantásticas. Se você gosta de  uma história elaborada e sem pontas soltas recomento comprar não apenas este mas, todos os jogos da franquia.

After beating a 100+ hour RPG, this was a nice "palette cleanser" so to speak.  In addition, I did NOT experience the technical issues that I had with BioShock Remastered, and noticed that others had with BioShock 2 (I played the BioShock 2 on console to avoid this).

It took me around 12 hours to beat the game on Medium, having explored a decent part of the optional content in the base game (no expansion game content).  Honestly I consider this to be the best game of the BioShock trilogy, which is tough for a sequel to do!  The professional reviewers all give this game praise, so I'll simply remark that the game does a great job of being detail-oriented in its brand new environment in the skies.  Also, while you do have a major NPC character alongside you for a good portion of the game, it is NOT BABYSITTING at all, and that character can handle themselves.  Playing the first two games in the series is not necessary to have fun with this game, as it's a completely new plot, environment, and characters.  Enjoy the game!

BioShock Infinite bietet ein unglaublich gutes und intensives Spielerlebnis mit einer ausgezeichneten Story und der besten Begleiterin, die man sich in einem Videospiel nur vorstellen kann! Ich persönlich kann dieses Spiel jedem nur herzlichst weiterempfehlen und wünsche euch ein atemberaubendes Spielerlebnis.

Despite a few hilights, the game has too many downsides to be considered a memorable game.
Steam doesn't offer an inbetween yes or no, so I'll give it a no.
- Structure almost identical to Bioshock
- Setting is kinda unique
- Terrible AI, suicidal enemies, boring fights, very casuallized
- Normal difficulty is a walk in the park
- Messy fights, sometimes the readability of a scene is bad to the point that you don't see where the gun shots are coming from.
- Having to force myself finishing the game because the story is not engaging and the fights get boring quickly
EDIT: Couldn't force myself enough to finish it, boredom took over.

You just keep going from one place to another shooting easy enemies with boring guns, of which there are barely any, and you can only carry two.  The story is incomprehensible in many ways, even though its also at the same time basic.

바이오쇼크 첫 입문작으로 산 게임입니다. 전작들은 공포게임이란 소리를 들을 정도로 무섭다길래 안했습니다. 힝힝이 공포겜 싫어요.

주인공 부커 드윗이 도박빚 문제로 소녀 하나를 어떤 수를 써서도 빚쟁이의 대리인에게 데려오기로 했고 그 소녀를 데리고 다니면서 컬럼비아라는 가상의 도시를 여행하는 내용입니다.

컬럼비아는 19-20세기 미국을 배경으로 인종차별과 군국주의가 만연해있고 빈부격차가 심한 곳 입니다. 스팀펑크에 초능력을 섞어 기괴하고도 신비로운 분위기를 주며 또 밝고 활기찬 분위기도 존재합니다. 

액션감이 좋습니다. 총은 반동이 있고 많이는 널널하지 않은 탄창이 근접공격을 적극적으로 쓰게 합니다. 또 무기와 연계할 수 있는 초능력이 더욱 속도감을 더해주며 상쾌한 느낌이 납니다.
가끔씩 플레이어에게 선택의 여지를 줍니다. 보통 나쁜 선택 두개 던져놓고 자 마음껏 골라보렴ㅎㅎ같은 느낌이 들긴하지만 적어도 안물어보는 것보단 나으니 전 좋았습니다.
구석구석 모을 것들이 많습니다. 덕분에 둘러보는 재미도 있고 세계관도 보고 좋네요.

한가지 아쉬운점이 있다면 한글 번역이 자주 직역으로 나옵니다. 맥락을 파악을 못하고 있어요. 

결과적으로 오랜간만에 줄거리가 탄탄한 FPS를 찾아서 아주 기부니가 좋네요. 꼭 사십쇼.
+세일하면 바숔 모음집이 인피니트 단품보다 쌀 때가 있으니 잘 비교해보고 사세요

방금 엔딩을 봤는데 몇몇 리뷰에서 보고 기대한 엄청난 명작이라 할것까지는 아니네요. 아마 이게 입문작이라 그런건지 전체 세계관을 잘 몰라서 줄거리 맥락 파악과 몰입이 잘 안됐네요. 그냥저냥 할만했습니다.
Muy buen juego.

So far I'm overwhelmed actually. Bioshock 1 & 2 were OK. Ok because the story and atmosphere are superb but the controls , the mechanics and stability (as a PC port) are pure garbage. Then you  play this game, no stuttering, good controls, options the whole thing and there is even more character development present. So I wanted to say that (the new)Irrational games team did a very good job at creating a Bioshock for PC gamers to love more. IMO the remasters should have been gone trough a mechanics/gameplay rework like infinite as well.

** PLAYED ENTIRELY ON LINUX -- IT'S NATIVE! **

Amazing shooter/adventure/stealth game with a number of bewildering mechanics which set it apart, a very particular and endearing aesthetic, and a breathtaking story that is sure to entertain and perplex you for dozens of hours.

It has no obvious flaws. Maybe it is a little grindy at times and that's it.

As mecânicas de combate poderiam ser enfadonhas, mas são envolventes, empolgantes e proporcionam momentos únicos. A trilha sonora é mágica, de altíssimo nível. O enredo é fantástico, com viradas perfeitamente desenvolvidas. A ambientação é profundamente imersiva. Os personagens são carismáticos. Enfim, o jogo é magnífico e precisa ser jogado.

当我在走廊外听到巴赫的G弦之歌时，我就知道，这个游戏是个杰作。唱诗班一样的 美术风格，古典而又契合气氛的音乐，这不是第九艺术是什么？

100 % recomendable. Primer juego de la saga al que juego dado que me pille la Bioshock Collection en rebajas y decidi pasarmelos en el orden cronológico que marca internet para así meterme más en la historia.
Una historia y un mundo lleno de detalles, hasta la papelera más escondida nos trae algo. Multitud de armas con las que jugar pero siempre tengamos en cuenta la munición. Una vez decidamos que arma se ajusta más a nosotros podemos centrar nuestra atención  en mejorar. Y como no al combate con armas le añadimos los vigorizadores que son una especie de poderes que hacen mucho más dinámico el combate.
Lo recomiendo pero eso sí no te dejes nada atras que sino no captas toda la trama de la historia.
